activities: We supply the fleet optimization, aircraft dispatch and customer booking software for EU and US based air taxi operators.
privacyprograms:
We are secured with a GoDaddy.com Web Server Certificate. Transactions on the site are protected with up to 256-bit Secure Sockets Layer encryption.
Certificate Policy and Certification Practice Statement (CPS)
recoursemech: to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives
